string.text: MP-155 Ultima

The MP-155 Ultima designed and manufactured by Kalashnikov Group is a high capacity combat shotgun, designed to provide the user with easy to access information during combat. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
RGN Hand Grenade

The RGN hand grenade short for Ruchnaya Granata Nastupatel'naya, is an offensive Soviet fragmentation hand grenade.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Blast power: %c[ui_gray_1]medium
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Blast radius: %c[ui_gray_1]2-5 m
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Avg. number of fragments: %c[ui_gray_1]75 (small shrapnels)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Explosion delay: %c[ui_gray_1]1.8 seconds
RGO Hand Grenade

The RGO hand grenade short for Ruchnaya Granata Oboronitel'naya, is an defensive Soviet fragmentation hand grenade.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Blast power: %c[ui_gray_1]medium
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Blast radius: %c[ui_gray_1]2-7 m
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Avg. number of fragments: %c[ui_gray_1]85 (small shrapnels)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Explosion delay: %c[ui_gray_1]1.8 seconds
Howa Type 89

The Howa Type 89 Assault Rifle, is a Japenese assault rifle chambered in 5.56x45mm .
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Surefire SOCOM556-Monster suppressor
Mk 14 EBR

United States Navy Mark 14 Enhanced Battle Rifle (Mk 14 Enhanced Battle Rifle, "improved combat rifle") - American Marksman rifle, created by special operations of the US Navy based on the M14 rifle. Used by a number of special units of the Navy, including SEAL.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45mm compatible suppressor
HK416

The HK416 is a rifle designed and manufactured by Heckler & Koch to improve the M4. It is available as a complete firearm, or as an upper receiver that fits on any AR-15 type lower receiver. The US Army's Delta Force collaborated with the German arms makers to develop the new rifle. Testing the H&K 416 in 2004 revealed that the piston operating system significantly reduces malfunctions while increasing the life of parts. The project was originally called the H&K M4, but was changed in response to a trademark infringement suit filed by Colt Defence. Currently, it is only available to government and military organisations, hence why this assault rifle is usually carried by Mercenaries.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45mm compatible suppressor
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] M203 grenade launcher
CMMG MK47 Mutant

CMMG Mk47 Mutant, American-made carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm, manufactured by CMMG Inc. Works with all types of AK magazines, including steel, polymer and drums. The carbine has shown exceptional reliability, which, together with the classic ergonomics of the AR system, gives an excellent example of a firearm. This variant features a fully automatic firing mode, for Law Enforcement and Millitary use only. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Hexagon 5.45/7.62x39mm sound suppressor
Molot VPO-101 "Vepr-Hunter" Carbine

Semi-automatic hunting carbine of 7.62x51mm caliber. It was created on the platform of Kalashnikov machine gun (RPK) and has a similar appearance, weight and dimensions. Designed for professional and amateur hunting of medium and big game, as well as sporting use. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] EKP-8-02 Kobra, 1P29, PSO1, ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March scopes
VPO-101 "Vepr-Hunter" 5 round magazine
Magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms with a capacity of 5 rounds of 7.62x51 caliber ammo.
VPO-101 "Vepr-Hunter" 10 round magazine
Magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms with a capacity of 10 rounds of 7.62x51 caliber ammo.
Rechambered VPO-101 "Vepr-Hunter" 10 round magazine
Rechambered magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems with a capacity of 5 rounds of 7.62x39 caliber ammo.
Rechambered VPO-101 "Vepr-Hunter" 10 round magazine
Rechambered magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems with a capacity of 10 rounds of 7.62x39 caliber ammo.
SAG AK-545 Carbine

AK chambered in 5.45x39mm developed by Sureshot Armament Group. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] TGP-A suppressor
Rifle Dynamics RD-704

Rifle Dynamics 704 assault rifle 7.62x39mm, an improved version of the AK system manufactured by Rifle Dynamics. The main difference from the standard AK: the design of the front part shifts the center of gravity closer to the receiver, which significantly improves the controllability of the weapon. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Rifle Dynamics ISG sound suppressor
HK G28

The HK G28 rifle was developed by Heckler & Koch specifically for the Bundeswehr as a support weapon for small infantry units. The G28 is based on the HK MR308, which, in turn, is a civilian version of the HK 417 automatic rifle. Despite several differences, the HK G28 is 75% interchangeable with the HK 417. This rifle is designed to shoot at distances inaccessible to standard 5.56mm assault rifles. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] AAC 7.62 SDN-6 suppressor
Lone Star TX-15 DML

The TX15 Designated Marksman Light (DML) series sets the standard for a small frame semi-automatic precision rifle. Utilizing lessons learned during the development of our Multi Purpose Carbine, the DML is optimized for mid-range shooting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ACOG, Barska ES AC10632, EOTech, Leupold, March, Mark 8 w/ rmr scopes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45mm compatible suppressor
